announcements.title: Staff Meeting Next Week
announcements.content: Please attend the monthly staff meeting next Tuesday at 3:00 PM in the conference room.

announcements.title: Welcome to ES International Department
announcements.content: Welcome to our new parent portal! Here you can access important announcements, events, and resources.

teacherReminders.title: Update Digital Learning Platforms
teacherReminders.content: Please update your classroom materials on the digital learning platform. Upload new assignments and ensure all links are working properly.

teacherReminders.title: Parent-Teacher Conference Preparation
teacherReminders.content: Prepare materials for upcoming parent-teacher conferences. Update student portfolios, prepare talking points, and schedule individual meeting slots.

teacherReminders.title: Submit Quarterly Progress Reports
teacherReminders.content: Please submit all student progress reports for Q1 by Friday. Include assessment rubrics and parent communication notes. Remember to double-check grades before submission.
